name: Michale Luffy
details: As the name suggests, a neurologist is responsible for treating and diagnosing issues of the nervous system. Our nervous system includes our brain, spinal cord, sensory organs, and all the nerves.

name: Adam Zoro
details: A radiologist for diagnosing diseases and internal & external injuries with the help of imaging techniques like x-rays, CT scan, MRI and ultrasound etc. They are the first step towards the diagnosis of any sort, which cannot be done without a machine.

name: Taylor Nami
details: An Anesthesiologists is responsible for treating the endocrine system which includes the pituitary gland, pancreas, ovaries, thyroid, hypothalamus etc. they help in treating diabetes, hyperthyroidism etc.

name: Mr. Akainu
details: Paediatricians are doctors who treat children. Since a childâ€™s body functions in a different manner from ours, due to many factors like age and growing stages, their illness and health issues are different from an adult. A paediatrician helps in mental behaviour issues and physical health problems.

name: Shaeu Eleina
details: Obstrtrician involves the study of all types of cancers. This involves the radiation, medical and surgical. Oncologists can specialise in one type of cancer as well as the field is vast.

name: Sanjida Henry
details: Mental health is a vast field which requires our uttermost attention. Therefore, to treat what goes inside a human brain is difficult, due to the uncertainty of it. A psychiatrist helps treat and diagnose issues of mental health.
